title: Generate Monthly Owner Report
description: A property owner requires their monthly financial statement. The PM needs to generate and send the report.

tasks.description: Identify the property owner and the specific property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct owner and property in the system.

tasks.description: Generate the 'Monthly Owner Statement' for the previous month.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a PDF report showing income, expenses, and net distribution.

tasks.description: Email the statement to the property owner with a brief summary.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is successfully emailed to the owner.
